entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -14.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 02:22 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -14.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: W 51 km/h gust 81 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with snow squalls near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
